items.content_html: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.

items.content_html: The Productivity Booster Chrome extension is your ultimate tool for staying organized and focused while browsing. This lightweight and user-friendly extension provides a to-do list directly accessible from any webpage. Stay on top of your tasks with features like task completion, deletion, and persistent storage.
